name: D. Not Adding
statement:
You have an array a_1, a_2,
dots, a_n consisting of n integers. You are allowed to perform the
following operation on it: Choose two elements from the array a_i and
a_j (i
ne j) such that
gcd(a_i, a_j) is not present in the array, and add
gcd(a_i, a_j) to the end of the array. Here
gcd(x, y) denotes greatest common divisor (GCD) of integers x and y.
Note that the array changes after each operation, and the subsequent
operations are performed on the new array.What is the number of times
you can perform the operation on the array?
